name: Purr Evil
description:
Purr Evil is our game for the Global Gamejam 2016!

It's a two player game in which you play two cute kitties and try to summon satan to detroy the planet Earth. Yup.

We had a lot of fun working on this little game !

Anouck Belthoise - @lelyss

JF Morin - @holyrum

Virginie Lesiège - @Vi_Lesiege

Marion Esquian - @mayhow
